title: Possible Moves by the Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan
text: Possible Moves by the Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan 5:05 AM EDT Citigroup Global Head of Equity Trading Strategy Antonin Jullier discusses global monetary policy. He speaks with Jonathan Ferro on Bloomberg Television’s “On The Move.” (Source: Bloomberg) Most Recent Videos September 10, 2015 Federal Reserve Rate Hike Indecision: To Go or Not to Go? 19:55 - Dean Maki, chief economist at Point72 Asset Management, discusses the guesswork surrounding the timing of a Federal Reserve rate hike. He speaks on "Bloomberg Surveillance." (Source: Bloomberg) September 10, 2015 Is Inflation 'No Compelling Reason' to Hike Rates? September 10, 2015 Rally Derailed as Jitters over Fed and China Persist September 9, 2015
